text:
> an other way might be to diffine the samples in an other place
> instead of module.conf and this could be overriden.

This could be implemented.

But my suggestion would be to transfer the sample configuration from the
resource type to the Create usecase. Overriding usecases is already supported.
creator: andreas@apache.org
